description: The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index. The underlying index is composed of all of the components of the S&P 500® Industrials Index, an index that contains the common stocks of all companies included in the S&P 500® Index that are classified as members of the industrials sector, as defined according to the Global Industry Classification Standard (GICS).
name: Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight Industrials ETF
